name: Battle Robots (itch)
description:
Engage in epic battles in a 6v6 arena with powerful Battle Robots! Turns are simultaneous so you have to predict what your opponent is going to do in order to come out on top!

Go to Team Select to set up you team of 6 Battle Robots and customize their attacks to you're liking. After that head into battle to see if you have what it takes to be the Battle Robot Master!

Music Credit: www.bensound.com
